official_title: Introduction of a Music-based Intervention for Patients Receiving Infusions at the Lifespan Cancer Institute Infusion Center in the Miriam Hospital
inclusion_criteria:
* Sufficient hearing capacity to hear music
* Scheduled for a chemotherapy infusion lasting at least 30 minutes
* Ability to complete pre- and post-assessments in English
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Participants who have had a prior infusion session with a music therapy intervention
